        @GetMapping(value="/location/{id}")
Location GetOneLocation(@PathVariable(value="id")

java.util.List<Location> GetAllLocations()

      • createLocation

        @PostMapping(value="/location/create")
java.lang.String createLocation(@RequestBody
                                                                        Location loc)
        Creates a new Location Object in the system
        Parameters:
        loc - The details of new Location
        Returns:
        A string that says if creation of Location Object was successful or not

      • updateLocation

        @PutMapping(value="/location/update/{id}")
Location updateLocation(@PathVariable
                                                                    int id,
                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                    Location request)
        Updates an individual Location Object based on its attributes
        Parameters:
        id - Requested Location ID that user wants to update
        request - The new details of updated Location
        Returns:
        Returns the newly updated Location Object

      • deleteLocation

        @DeleteMapping(value="/location/delete/{id}")
java.lang.String deleteLocation(@PathVariable
                                                                               int id)
        Deletes a specific Location Object from the system
        Parameters:
        id - Location ID of Location Object wanting to delete
        Returns:
        A string that says whether or not deletion of Location is successful

      • allLocationsVisited

        @GetMapping(value="/location/visited")
public java.util.List<Location> allLocationsVisited(@RequestParam
                                                                                            int userID)
        Returns a list of Locations that User with ID id has visited
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of specific User
        Returns:
        A list of Locations that User has visited
